pr_title: Show a notification in the UI after live reload happened (#7820)

timeline.message:
Fix disable not working

Fix disable not working because of assertion error when the notification is never rendered

Change timestamp message and leading zeroes

Change timestamp message to explicitly say that the time presented is the time of the last automatic reload.
Create method buildStringWith2LeadingZeroes() in order to present the reload timestamp in a standard fashion.

timeline.message:
Add LiveReload timestamp visible functionality

Add events and code to show reload timestamp when reloading and hiding it when the focus is on the page body. If the LiveReload overlay is open, then the timestamp should be also visible regardless of focus.
